attributes.action: Safeguard the Science museums northern sites.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to prevent the closure of one of the Science Museum Group northern facilities.
The Government funded group must be given sufficient funding to keep ALL of the three museums fully open.
The museums under review are: The Museum of Science & Industry in Manchester, The National Media Museum in Bradford & The National Railway Museum in York.
These museums are all unique, have items of national importance & deserve to be kept.
